subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Boston Celtics lost their franchise-record 18th consecutive game yesterday when a jumper from near the corner by Minnesota’s Ricky Davis with two-tenths of a second left gave the Timberwolves a 109-107 victory.
snippet: The Boston Celtics lost their franchise-record 18th consecutive game yesterday when a jumper from near the corner by Minnesota’s Ricky Davis with two-tenths of a second left gave the Timberwolves a 109-107 victory.
